cars.description:
This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan 
      Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, 
      power everything.

This is an immaculate 2015 Ford 
      Escape with only 15000 miles on it. Leather seats, 
      power everything.

This is an immaculate 2012 NChevy 
      Malibu with only 2000 miles on it. Leather seats, 
      power everything.
